classmeta.shortdesc: Vertical slider widget for selecting a value from a range.

desc.para: A GtkVScale is a vertical scrollbar-like widget that is able to display its adjustment value as text.
There are some configuration issues with this widget when it is used in such a way; please refer to GtkScale for further information.
A GtkVScale that can be given its own GtkAdjustment settings has no configuration issues whatever.

constructor.shortdesc: Creates a vertical slider with specified range.
